DescriptionData.Title: Alan Sloane Colored Costume Gloves w/ Snap
DescriptionData.Description: Colored clown costume gloves in a full spectrum of colors. Made of nylon and with a snap at the wrist, these clown gloves stretch slightly so that one size fits most. Available in several colors.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Nylon costume gloves perfect for parades or for clown costumes
These have a snap at the wrist for a snugger fit
Medium adult size fits most
Sold in pairs only
